summary: Increased the amount of gold you get from \"Bounty\" type quests.
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=5]ATTENTION:[/size][/b]
This mod has been superseded by this one:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36534]Bounty Gold[/url]





Increased Bounty Rewards - By Gorey666 (aka Gorey)

*************************************************************
Description
*************************************************************
Increases the Reward gold for the random bounty quests.


Normal Version:
------------------
Bandit Leader = 1,000
Giant = 2,500
Dragon = 5,000


Lite Version:
------------------
Bandit Leader = 500
Giant = 1,000
Dragon = 2,500


Ultra_lite Version:
------------------
Bandit Leader = 250
Giant = 500
Dragon = 1,000


Leveled Version
------------------
Bandit Leader = 30 * Player Level
Giant = 50 * Player Level
Dragon = 75 * Player Level







[b]Other mods by me:[/b]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36534]Bounty Gold[/url] - 100 gold for killing a dragon? No thanks!
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11025]Transmute Iorn Ore First[/url] - Essential if you like crafting jewelry.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22940]Functional Homes[/url] - Make every home your current home.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36512]Light Foot Only While Sneaking[/url] - Don\'t sneak without it!
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36514]Alchemy Tree Re-organized[/url] - Specialize in Potions or Poisons.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22996]No Leveled Item Rewards[/url] - Get the best reward item regardless of your level.
author: gorey666
